mapper.select: select id, userId, partyId, orderNo, amt, payType, orderName, orderDetail, status, crtTime, updTime, respData, extProps from ha_pay_record where id=#{id}
select id, userId, partyId, orderNo, amt, payType, orderName, orderDetail, status, crtTime, updTime, respData, extProps from ha_pay_record where orderNo=#{orderNo}
mapper.insert: insert into ha_pay_record( userId, partyId, orderNo, amt, payType, orderName, orderDetail, status, crtTime, updTime, extProps ) values( #{userId}, #{partyId}, #{orderNo}, #{amt}, #{payType}, #{orderName}, #{orderDetail}, 1, now(), null, #{extProps} )
mapper.update: update ha_pay_record set status = #{status}, updTime = now() where id = #{id}
update ha_pay_record set respData = #{respData}, updTime = now() where id = #{id}
